'''The Very Special Fortune Slip''' is a [[World Quest]] Series in [[Inazuma]]. To unlock this quest series, players must complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]]: "[[Gendou Ringo's Strange Fortune Slips]]."

The quest can be unlocked by getting the tattered note on the Fatui camp by Grand Narukami Shrine northeast foot.
